events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at AFC Bournemouth

headlines.description: Harry Wilson and Callum Wilson both got on the scoresheet as Bournemouth as they ended their four-game losing streak against Brighton & Hove Albion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth break skid with win over Brighton

headlines.description: Aston Villa climbed out of the relegation zone with a dramatic 2-1 win over Watford, who go back down into the bottom three of the table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Villa's late goal puts Watford back in relegation zone

headlines.description: Southampton made sure there was no repeat of their weekend collapse against Wolves as they claimed an impressive 2-0 win at Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton impress again in win over Crystal Palace

headlines.description: Striker Moise Kean finally opened his Everton account with his first goal for the club but Newcastle United scored twice late to earn a draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle score in 94th, 95th minute to draw

headlines.description: Sergio Aguero came off the bench to score the winner as Manchester City beat Sheffield United 1-0 at Bramall Lane on Tuesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jesus misses pen, Aguero scores winner for City

headlines.description: Arsenal recovered from seeing David Luiz sent off to twice come from behind with 10 men and earn a 2-2 draw at Stamford Bridge on Tuesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Luiz sent off, Bellerin earns 10-man Arsenal draw
